game.name: Flesh Everest
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Descend into FLESH EVEREST, a brutal survival horror FPS set inside a massive, living mountain of meat. Fight, scavenge, and escape the horrors that fester inside.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Descend into FLESH EVEREST, a brutal survival horror FPS set inside a massive, living mountain of meat. Fight, scavenge, and escape the horrors that fester inside.
